metadata.title: CVE-2014-3005 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: XML external entity (XXE) vulnerability in Zabbix 1.8.x before 1.8.21rc1, 2.0.x before 2.0.13rc1, 2.2.x before 2.2.5rc1, and 2.3.x before 2.3.2 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files or potentially execute arbitrary code via a crafted DTD in an XML request. It was discovered that Zabbix incorrectly handled certain XML files. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to read arbitrary files or potentially execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.2.5+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
